dataList.name: Revenge
dataList.desc:
- Low Morale
- Gain 3 Defense Level Down and 3 Damage Up
dataList.summary: Gain 3 Defense Level Down and 3 Damage Up

dataList.name: Revenge
dataList.desc:
- Panic
- Gain 6 Defense Level Down and 5 Damage Up
dataList.summary: Gain 6 Defense Level Down and 5 Damage Up

dataList.name: Marked Prey
dataList.desc:
- With every hit this unit takes, take bonus Slash damage equal to 10% of the HP damage taken. Expires next turn.
- If this unit does not take damage during this turn, inflict 1 Inferiority Complex after attack then expires
- Max Value: 1
dataList.summary: Take bonus Slash damage equal to 10% of the HP damage taken

dataList.name: Inferiority Complex
dataList.desc:
- Every time this unit is hit, take ((20% of HP damage taken) * {0}) damage
- Max Value: 5
dataList.summary: Take ((20% of HP damage taken) * {0}) damage

dataList.name: Explosive Gloom
dataList.desc:
- Gloom Affinity Resistance +0.3
- Other Affinity Resistance -0.5
- When hit: inflict 3 SP damage on the attacker, gain 1 Sinking Count, and gain 1 Offense Level Up next turn (9 times per turn)
dataList.summary:
Resistance to Gloom(and only Gloom) becomes Fatal.
When hit: Inflict 3 SP damage on the attacker, gain 1 Sinking Count, and gain 1 Offense Level Up next turn.

dataList.name: Explosive Envy
dataList.desc:
- Envy Affinity Resistance +0.3
- Other Affinity Resistance -0.5
- When hit: apply 1 Offense Level Up, inflict 2 Bleed, and 2 Bleed Count on attacker, and gain 1 Defense Level Down next turn (9 times per turn)
dataList.summary:
Resistance to Envy(and only Envy) becomes Fatal
When hit: apply 1 Offense Level Up, 2 Bleed, and 2 Bleed Count on target, and gain 1 Defense Level Down next turn

dataList.name: Explosive Wrath
dataList.desc:
- Wrath Affinity Resistance +0.3
- Other Affinity Resistance -0.5
- When hit: Gain 1 Offense Level Up and 1 Defense Level Down next turn (9 times per turn)
dataList.summary:
Resistance to Wrath(and only Wrath) becomes Fatal.
When hit, gain 1 Offense Level Up and 1 Defense Level Down.

dataList.name: Deep Bereavement
dataList.desc: Turn Start: Lose 5 Speed and gain 5 Defense Level Down

dataList.name: Misshapen Painting
dataList.desc:
- Low Morale
- Gain 1 Attack Power Up & 1 Fragile

dataList.name: Misshapen Painting
dataList.desc:
- Panic
- Gain 1 Plus Coin Boost & 3 Fragile

dataList.name: Hatred
dataList.desc:
- Low Morale
- Clash Win: Gain 1 Offense Level Up next turn. (max 3 per turn)
Clash Lose: Gain 1 Defense Level Up. (max 3 per turn)

dataList.name: Hatred
dataList.desc:
- Panic
- Clash Win: Gain 1 Offense Level Up this turn and next turn. (max 3 per turn)
Clash Lose: Gain 1 Defense Level Up. (max 3 per turn)
Turn End: Gain 2 Haste next turn
